text:
EOD 08/02/2024:
‚Ä¢ setup a terraform server to manage gcp from anywhere.
‚Ä¢ test run terraform commands to spin up a basic vpc and destroy the same.

EOD 10/02/2024

‚Ä¢ worked on vpc creation using terraform
‚Ä¢ setup gcs / storage buckets on gcp to manage terraform state.

EOD 14/02/2023
‚Ä¢ setup encrypted storage bucket for terraform state
‚Ä¢ worked on terraform configs for setting up vpc and db for care

EOD 14/02/2023
‚Ä¢ Completed the VPC terraform script with remote state
‚Ä¢ familiarised with middleware update script with ansible
‚Ä¢ understood how to configure new spoke installation scripts.

EOD 16/02/2023
‚Ä¢ Started working on db script

EOD 19/02/2023
‚Ä¢ worked on terraform-gcp
‚Ä¢ added few carestatus monitors

EOD 21/02/2023
‚Ä¢ finalized db section in terraform

EOD 22/02/2023
‚Ä¢ started working on jumpserver for middlewares
‚Ä¢ worked more on cleaning up terraform script

EOD 23/02/2023
‚Ä¢ started working on documenting the terraform-gcp

EOD 28/1/2024
‚Ä¢ tried debugging the terraform statebucket config.
‚Ä¢ deployed metabase / care dbs to newly migrated instance.

EOD 29/1/2024
‚Ä¢ finished setting up the K8s Cluster
‚Ä¢ working on translating infra_template to terraform.

EOD 5/03/2024
‚Ä¢ wrote gke-workload section of terraform gcp
‚Ä¢ started working on helm scripts for gke

EOD 6/03/2024
‚Ä¢ worked on rewriting infra_template to helm
‚Ä¢ helped with debugging middleware instance.

EOD 7/03/2024
‚Ä¢ finished migrating infra_templates to helm_chart.
‚Ä¢ worked debugging issues with deployment chart

EOD 12/03/2024
‚Ä¢ rewrote infra_template to terraform and pushed changes.

EOD 13/03/2024
‚Ä¢ Fixed config issues for care_fe deployment in terraform.

EOD 15/03/2024
‚Ä¢ improved K8s and VPC sections of Terraform Script.

EOD 18/03/2024
‚Ä¢ finished tidying up the VPC directory of Terraform
‚Ä¢ almost done with database section too.

EOD 20/03/2024
‚Ä¢ Wrote a middleware script for an instance.
‚Ä¢ Started working on middleware script generator

EOD 27/03/2024
‚Ä¢ Pushed working draft of terraform scripts and gave a demo for the same.

EOD 03/04/2024
‚Ä¢ pushed draft script to convert the existing middleware scripts to single yaml file.
‚Ä¢ bug fixes on the middleware generating python script.

EOD 05/04/2024
‚Ä¢ Made PR from terraform testing branch to master.
‚Ä¢ Worked on improving middleware generating scripts.

EOD 08/04/2024
‚Ä¢ drafted a obsidian vault for documenting dev-ops docs
‚Ä¢ worked on ansible script for migrating middleware to cert based auth

EOD 11/04/2024
‚Ä¢ pushed Docusaurus devops-docs to 10bedicu
‚Ä¢ tested ansible script for cert authentication.
‚Ä¢ worked on terraform script to manage cloudflare access applications

EOD 15/04/2024
‚Ä¢ pushed final draft of DevOps Docs
‚Ä¢ rewrote and tested ansible script to add provided ssh pub key to middleware instances.

EOD 17/04/2024
‚Ä¢ Added ssh-key ansible script to devops docs.
‚Ä¢ finished working on the midlleware ssh-key script

EOD 18/04/2024
‚Ä¢ test deployed care-devops-docs.
‚Ä¢ helped with ssh-key migration.
‚Ä¢ configured hosts.yml required for jumpserver ansible scripts.

12 November 2024

‚Ä¢ Setup Non-Core member Question workflow #8889
‚Ä¢ Tested out deploying OHC Landing to test cloudflare account.
‚Ä¢ Resolved Arike downtime and prepared an estimate for upgrading ec2 to next tier.
‚Ä¢ finished working on a working draft of terraform script to deploy care on digitalocean app platform
Next
‚Ä¢ clean up the terraform setup
‚Ä¢ update the docs.
‚Ä¢ finish deploying the OHC Landing page

13 Nov 2024
‚Ä¢ did cleanup on the DO-Terraform script and pushed to gh-repo
‚Ä¢ enabled scribe and abdm plugs in staging fe.
‚Ä¢ Deployed OHC Landing to test domain

14th November
‚Ä¢ Moved ohc.network to cloudflare pages.
‚Ä¢ made more clean up and got review from @UC9JELJEP on DO-Terraform setup
‚Ä¢ Made a bash script to generate jwks needed for new deployments.
‚Ä¢ Drafted cloud costing report for new state
Up Next
‚Ä¢ Apply suggested changes to DO-Terraform Setup
‚Ä¢ Update Docs for DO-Terraform setup.

Nov 15 EOD
‚Ä¢ Updated Docs for DigitalOcean #80 .
‚Ä¢ Drafted Cloud Cost Sheet.
‚Ä¢ Had call with Datadog rep.
‚Ä¢ Worked on DO-Terraform folder structuring.
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete cloud cost sheet
‚Ä¢ finish structuring terraform.
‚Ä¢ get #80 reviewed and merged.

18th November
‚Ä¢ Updated #80 by adding structure to images and adding JWKS generator component.
‚Ä¢ performed v24.47.0 Release.
Up Next
‚Ä¢ Clean up and publish DO-Terraform Script.
‚Ä¢ work on Improving non-core-qn workflow.

19th November
‚Ä¢ restructured DO terraform scripts to modules.
‚Ä¢ Updated cloud Costing Sheet.
‚Ä¢ Resized ohifviewer VM to smaller one to reduce cost.
‚Ä¢ Played around with instatus for uptime monitoring.
next
‚Ä¢ Test and verify working of modules in terraform
‚Ä¢ complete cloud costing sheet and perform measures to reduce cloud cost.

20th November
‚Ä¢ Debugged care_scribe issue with arike deployment.
‚Ä¢ created usage / cloud cost sheet for new state.
Next
‚Ä¢ Verify care_scribe is working as expected

21st November 2024
‚Ä¢ fixed version mismatch error for care_scribe in arike
‚Ä¢ finished drafting the cloud cost sheet AWS | GCP | DigitalOcean
‚Ä¢ switched terraform setup from modules to folder based structure
‚Ä¢ implemented storage spaces based remote state for terraform
Up Next:
‚Ä¢ test and push final changes to the digitalOcean terraform script

22nd November 2024
‚Ä¢ Customized cloud Requirement docs for new state.
‚Ä¢ had a call with State rep for cloud procurement.
‚Ä¢ disabled unused users in Arike based on request from Dr. Nithin
‚Ä¢ Migrated cloud cost report for palliative to notion.
‚Ä¢ improved Cloud Infra Diagram for Care generic Infra and Care on DigitalOcean App Platform.
Next

‚Ä¢ Finalize the network architecture for care in ecs and update the cloud cost report
‚Ä¢ push the corrections for do docs PR.
‚Ä¢ Draft JD for new role.

25 November 2024
‚Ä¢ Pushed minor fixes for digitalocean docs.
‚Ä¢ Got Palliative Care cloud cost reviewed.
‚Ä¢ Performed weekly release for production.
‚Ä¢ updated non-core GitHub notification to reduce the message content to the commentUrl.
next.
‚Ä¢ test and draft a PR for non-core GitHub notification Improvement.
‚Ä¢ Update production scale cost for care palliative based on dev.

26 November 2024
‚Ä¢ Finished drafting Palliative care cost.
‚Ä¢ Tried to test out improved non-core-qn workflow. Workflow edits are now disabled for non admin users.
‚Ä¢ refactored the workflow to use slack webhook directly instead of workflow, observed no popup/opengraph info are being shown.
‚Ä¢ Deployed Hotfix to solve address field bug.
‚Ä¢ Tried out modules from scratch again with terraform to see if I can reduce redundancy in existing script.
Next
‚Ä¢ decide between slack app webhook / workflow webhook for non-core questions
‚Ä¢ clean up and push terraform script.

November 27 2024
‚Ä¢ Edited the Slack Workflow to solve #9113 and tested the GitHub Action.
‚Ä¢ Drafted #9220 for improving non core user qn workflow.
‚Ä¢ Imported LOINC to snowstorm instance.
‚Ä¢ had a call with hub admin to fix shiggaon spoke.
‚Ä¢ Had intro call with @U0576PEACG0
Next
‚Ä¢ Start Drafting the Middleware Reliability doc.
‚Ä¢ clean up state management for do-terraform

29 November 2024
‚Ä¢ Pushed the restructured terraform script with folder structure that can deploy components individually.
‚Ä¢ Drafted #9237 to fix build failure in DigitalOcean app platform.
Next
‚Ä¢ New state SDC call with sdc rep
‚Ä¢ review and cleanup Terraform script.

2nd December 2024
‚Ä¢ Worked on grafana dashboards for community deployments.
‚Ä¢ Performed production release.
‚Ä¢ worked on fixing dh-loong / dmmdh-wokha middleware issues.
Next
‚Ä¢ fix the Staging/production CI/CD pipeline to show build / deploy status.

December 3 2024
‚Ä¢ resolved coderabbit comments on #9220
‚Ä¢ Drafted new GCP workflow to send build status notification to slack.
‚Ä¢ tested out Coolify.
‚Ä¢ Performed delayed weekly Production release
December 4 2024
‚Ä¢ Merged #9220 and tested the updated Questions from github workflow.
‚Ä¢ Updated #9237 to use ^22.11.0
‚Ä¢ fixed middlewares longleng and wokha
December 5
‚Ä¢ deployed Medispeak to Coolify, figuring out how to proxy it.
‚Ä¢ Created Slack notification channel for GCP-Staging Build/deploy pipeline and configured the cloudbuild to send updates.
Next
‚Ä¢ Fix digitalocean build failure that's happening because of wrong buildpack
‚Ä¢ Proxy to make medispeak available
‚Ä¢ Attend Gnome Asia Summit 2024 BLR.

Nov 06 2024
‚Ä¢ Attended Gnome Asia Summit 2024.
‚Ä¢ Fixed Longleng and Wokha Middlewares
Next
‚Ä¢ Deploy Snowstorm on Coolify
‚Ä¢ Update palliative cloud docs.

9 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Went to the Office.
‚Ä¢ Played around with coolify and deployed snowstorm
‚Ä¢ made updates to palliative cloud cost doc.
‚Ä¢ Performed weekly Production release.
Next
‚Ä¢ Document coolify deployments.
‚Ä¢ Improve slack notification for staging build.
‚Ä¢ fix digitalocean deployment with proper node version.

10 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Loaded ICD 10 to coolify snowstorm instance.
‚Ä¢ Worked on setting up wildcard domains for coolify
‚Ä¢ Debugged Medispeak.
Next
‚Ä¢ Fix medispeak on coolify.
‚Ä¢ Update terminology server docs for loading extensions.

11 December
‚Ä¢ Troubleshooted ssmm middleware for plexus deployment.
‚Ä¢ Debugged medispeak backend image
Next
‚Ä¢ Take db backups for prod
‚Ä¢ Update prod db versions to latest.

Dec 13
‚Ä¢ Drafted Network requirements for spoke hospitals.
‚Ä¢ Tested out SNS for sending SMS
Dec 15
‚Ä¢ Tried to enable HCX to DO deployment.
‚Ä¢ found pydantic version issues with HCX notified @U01JB8L8P7Y
Dec 16
‚Ä¢ Opened Limit increase request for SNS
‚Ä¢ tried out more ways to debug medispeak in coolify.
‚Ä¢ performed weekly production release, rescheduled to tomorrow due to NPM server issues.
Next
‚Ä¢ Hope NPM issues get resolved and perform weekly prod release
‚Ä¢ Get SNS ready to go and setup SMS Gateway for DO Deployment
‚Ä¢ Get #8 and #2652 merged to enable HCX on DO Deployment.

December 17 2024
‚Ä¢ Kept checking #7893 and Incident Report npmjs and performed delayed weekly release succesfully
‚Ä¢ Setup SNS SMS Gateway for DO Deployment and verified working from sandbox.
‚Ä¢ Followed up on resource quota increase.
Next
‚Ä¢ Improve AWS pipeline and gcp staging pipelines.

18 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Restored Sudheendra middleware for plexus deployment after smps outage.
‚Ä¢ Identified cdn issue with coronasafe domain restricting loading of css elements, verified it in dev middleware.
‚Ä¢ fixed plausible OHC deployment with adding a new volume mount for docker volumes.
19 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Performed resource labelling in gcp for granular billing details.
‚Ä¢ Updated GCP and AWS Pipelines to fix minor bugs.
‚Ä¢ Updated the Egov Costing Sheet.
‚Ä¢ Brushed through GIGW for compliance standards.
‚Ä¢ Restored staging-metabase instance, performed the initial setup and gave access to @U02D0NA6RHR
‚Ä¢ Got rid of Care Dashboard from staging.
Next.
‚Ä¢ Deploy updated django middleware to dev server.
‚Ä¢ Investigate cdn issues with coronasafe.xyz
‚Ä¢ Ensure reliability of Plausible deployment.
‚Ä¢ Schedule deprecation of care dashboard from production.

23 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Helped recover user creds in arike instance.
‚Ä¢ Deployed Possibly the last Production release of 2024 :squirrel:
‚Ä¢ Performed Staging Metabase DB upgrade from PG 15 to 17

26 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Drafted Cloudfront Deployment workflow for palliative deployment.
‚Ä¢ Drafted ECS workflow for palliative deployment.
‚Ä¢ enabled care_scribe in DO-Deployment
Next
‚Ä¢ finish and merge Cloudfront, ECS PR's

30 December 2024
‚Ä¢ Updated care_fe at keralacare to the new api url.
‚Ä¢ updated ECS workflow to use official github action instead of bash scripts.
‚Ä¢ Performed production release.
Next.
‚Ä¢ create db backup buckets in staging and production to take cloudsql backup before the HMIS rollout.

2nd January 2025

‚Ä¢ Applied the changes to care staging

Up next.

‚Ä¢ broke and restored terminology server üíÄ
